title: Dark mode toggle position inconsistent between pages
description: On index page, dark toggle is at x=1204 (right side). On category page, it's at x=32 (left side). Users may have difficulty finding it.
steps:
1. Open index.html, note toggle position
2. Open category page, note toggle position
suggestion: Unify position to bottom-left (near sidebar) or bottom-right consistently

title: Elements causing horizontal overflow on mobile
description:
When content is expanded on mobile, these elements overflow:
button.filter-chip: right=401px, width=47px
button.filter-chip: right=453px, width=47px
button.filter-chip: right=505px, width=47px
button.filter-chip: right=556px, width=47px
select#subjectFilter.toolbar-select: right=808px, width=792px
steps: Open category page on mobile, expand a subject card
suggestion: Add overflow-wrap: break-word to container or max-width: 100% to overflowing elements

title: Horizontal overflow on Galaxy Fold (280px)
suggestion: Check Galaxy Fold media query coverage
